Package ptree

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dna
    Represents one DNA sequence.
    DNAPreprocessor
    Preprocess all DNAs and store aside all positions that are the same in all DNAs.
    GapHandler
    Gaps in the internal nodes of a tree are generally not allowed.
    Intermediates
    To infer intermediates in MST version.
    Mutation
    Represents one point mutation.
    MutationManager  
    Mutations
    Represents a list of mutations that defines difference between two DNAs.
    NJTree  
    PhyloTreeTest
    To test the tree whether it really corresponds to the phylogenetic tree.
    PTree
    Main class of the algorithm.
    PTreeMethods
    Contains static methods to work with a tree.
    Sampling  
    SamplingManager
    Manages subsampling.
    TestDnaChars
    Test DNA representation.
    Tree
    Represents a tree in terms of its cost, original vertices and intermediate (inferred) vertices.
    TreeComparator
    To compare the current tree with a new tree to decide which tree will be as the current tree in the next iteration.
    Vertex
    Vertex of a tree.
